title: BBQ4Life
typeOfFood: Vegan-friendly, Lacto, Ovo, American, Beer/Wine, Take-out, Non-veg
description: Serves meat, veg options available. In late-2014 MFT BBQ and Vegan renamed and moved to this location. Same menu of traditional BBQ along with vegan food. Vegan choices such as smoked tempeh sandwich, spicy coleslaw, beans, and potato salad. Kitchen makes its own sauces and rubs.
